main event: A series of UFO sightings were reported across various locations in September 1956, including Mainz, Germany, Burlington, Wisconsin, Twin Falls, Idaho, and Moneymore, Northern Ireland.
interesting points: A bell-shaped object was seen crossing the sky in Mainz, Germany, changing color rapidly from orange to dark red., In Burlington, Wisconsin, several residents reported a fast-moving object tentatively identified as a weather balloon., In Twin Falls, Idaho, a farmer reported a large glowing object that swooped down near his ranch and made a 400-pound steer disappear., A sighting in Moneymore, Northern Ireland involved a flaming red saucer which reportedly kicked the witness over when he tried to capture it., Multiple reports emphasized the presence of no photographs related to the sightings, highlighting the reliance on witness accounts.
sighted object: various unidentified flying objects, including round, bell-shaped, and saucer-shaped objects
location: Mainz, Rheinland-Pfalz, Germany; Burlington, Wisconsin, USA; Twin Falls, Idaho, USA; Moneymore, Northern Ireland
witness description: civilians, including farmers and multiple residents
